channel.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
channel.description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.

image.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories

item.title: Bad Bunny wins Grammy for album of the year
item.description: At the 2026 Grammys, Bad Bunny became the first artist to win the album of the year award for a Spanish-language release. Kendrick Lamar and Lady Gaga also took home major awards.
item.content:encoded:
At the 2026 Grammys, Bad Bunny became the first artist to win the album of the year award for a Spanish-language release. Kendrick Lamar and Lady Gaga also took home major awards.

(Image credit: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Isabella Gomez Sarmiento

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for 2 years for construction in July, Trump says
item.description: President Trump says he will move to close Washington's Kennedy Center for two years. It follows a wave of cancellations since Trump ousted the previous leadership and added his name to the building.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump says he will move to close Washington's Kennedy Center for two years. It follows a wave of cancellations since Trump ousted the previous leadership and added his name to the building.

(Image credit: Mark Schiefelbein)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: What to know about Artemis II's 'wet dress rehearsal'
item.description: As astronauts prepare to fly around the moon, critical testing must occur before there is "Go" for launch.
item.content:encoded:
As astronauts prepare to fly around the moon, critical testing must occur before there is "Go" for launch.

(Image credit: Miguel J. Rodriguez Carrillo)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: Bomb cyclone brings bitter cold and snow to the Southeast
item.description: Temperatures in southern Florida reached the coldest they've been since 1989, according to the National Weather Service.
item.content:encoded:
Temperatures in southern Florida reached the coldest they've been since 1989, according to the National Weather Service.

(Image credit: Sean Rayford)
item.dc:creator: Katia Riddle

item.title: The complete list of 2026 Grammy winners and nominees
item.description: Kendrick Lamar won the most trophies of any any artist, Bad Bunny made history by taking home the album of the year award and Olivia Dean won best new artist.
item.content:encoded:
Kendrick Lamar won the most trophies of any any artist, Bad Bunny made history by taking home the album of the year award and Olivia Dean won best new artist.

(Image credit: Kevin Winter)

item.title: Swiss Alpine bar fire claims 41st victim, an 18-year-old Swiss national
item.description: Swiss prosecutors have opened a criminal investigation into the owners of Le Constellation bar in the ski resort of Crans-Montana, where a fire in the early hours of Jan. 1 killed dozens.
item.content:encoded:
Swiss prosecutors have opened a criminal investigation into the owners of Le Constellation bar in the ski resort of Crans-Montana, where a fire in the early hours of Jan. 1 killed dozens.

(Image credit: Cyril Zingaro)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Sunday Puzzle: Rhyme Time
item.description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe plays the puzzle with WBUR listener Laurie Rose and Weekend Edition Puzzlemaster Will Shortz.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe plays the puzzle with WBUR listener Laurie Rose and Weekend Edition Puzzlemaster Will Shortz.
item.dc:creator: Will Shortz

item.title: Alcaraz beats Djokovic to become the youngest man to complete a career Grand Slam
item.description: The 22-year-old Spaniard's win against 38-year-old rival Novak Djokovic at Sunday's Australian Open makes him the youngest male player to win all four major tournaments.
item.content:encoded:
The 22-year-old Spaniard's win against 38-year-old rival Novak Djokovic at Sunday's Australian Open makes him the youngest male player to win all four major tournaments.

(Image credit: Mark Baker)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: You already know the song — now, 'The One About the Blackbird' is also a picture book
item.description: In The One About the Blackbird, a young boy learns to play guitar from his grandfather. And there's one song in particular that they love…
item.content:encoded: In The One About the Blackbird, a young boy learns to play guitar from his grandfather. And there's one song in particular that they love…
item.dc:creator: Samantha Balaban

item.title: At a clown school near Paris, failure is the lesson
item.description: For decades, students at the Ecole Philippe Gaulier have been paying to bomb onstage. The goal isn't laughs — it's learning how to take the humiliation and keep going.
item.content:encoded:
For decades, students at the Ecole Philippe Gaulier have been paying to bomb onstage. The goal isn't laughs — it's learning how to take the humiliation and keep going.

(Image credit: Rebecca Rosman for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Rosman
